definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平顺而得到加强，一个标准，回扭矩限制离合器。

sentences.english: No transition is ever smooth or easy.
sentences.chinese: 不曾有过平顺或轻松的过渡。

sentences.english: Detailed analysis to the pump sending system of the concrete pump has carried on.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土泵泵送系统油缸的换向平顺性问题。

sentences.english: Exert you to let a going smoothly diapason with all strength.
sentences.chinese: 尽你的全力让家平顺和谐。

sentences.english: The influence of variation of stiffness and damping on vehicle ride performance is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了刚度和阻尼的变化对车辆平顺性的影响。

sentences.english: Track irregularity is an important excitation source which can cause vibration of the Traffic-Track system.
sentences.chinese: 轨道不平顺是引起车辆系统振动的重要激振源。

sentences.english: The result is "softer" shock-absorber characteristics and, consequently, a high level of ride comfort.
sentences.chinese: 它的结果是软减振器特性和很好的平顺性。

sentences.english: The dynamic railway-detecting instrument is an effective way to examining the smooth of the railway.
sentences.chinese: 轨道动态测试仪是检测轨道平顺性的有效手段。

sentences.english: Mechanic design assures steady, smooth and durable stitching.
sentences.chinese: 机械式的设计使车缝更稳定平顺与耐用。

sentences.english: The hindquarters drive smoothly and with great power.
sentences.chinese: 后躯驱动力平顺，而且非常强大。

sentences.english: The primary factor affecting the wheel-rail force is the short wave track irregularity.
sentences.chinese: 轨面短波不平顺是轮轨作用力的主要影响因素。

definition: a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes/a cadence/punctuated by a transition/with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)
angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
